Hamilton, the sixth-leading scorer in franchise history, has spent 13 of the past 14 games on the inactive list. That's kind of hard for me to imagine, Antonio McDyess said. As Detroit continues the long reconstruction project, which began in 2008 when general manager Joe Dumars dealt Chauncey Billups to Denver in a deal for Allen Iverson , Antonio McDyess is girding for another title.

" Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the "golden age' of the popular music business," Joel said in a statement. At the time, his` hands-off' approach to how rock and roll music was presented made television a viable medium for many now-iconic recording artists. Paul Shaffer , David Letterman "s musical director, used to give a deadpan performance during his imitation of Don Kirshner on Saturday Night Live.
